description:
(nova): TRACE: Stderr: "iptables-restore v1.4.4: Couldn't load target `nova-compute-provider':/lib/xtables/libipt_nova-compute-provider.so: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory

Error occurred at line: 23
Try `iptables-restore -h' or 'iptables-re

it happens when you have instances running and you restart nova-compute
title: restart of nova-compute fails to create iptables rules
